ygData.subject: Odds and ends.
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all with the new patch has anybody checked the stats on the Dark Forged armor (and hopefully they change the color as well)? On the rumor front,
ygData.messageBody:
First of all with the new patch has anybody checked the stats on the Dark
Forged armor (and hopefully they change the color as well)?

On the rumor front, supposedly the Fiery Avenger has been found. Rumored
stats on sword 33Dmg 33Dly Effect: Combust (180dmg DD or so) Paladin Only.
Now I don't mind that the Paladin's get a really nice weapon, what gets me
is that they can obtain their nice weapons through Quest. I would much
rather obtain a kick ass weapon from questing (not camping, but an actual
quest) than having to kill a god (Soul Leech, what's with the 50pt lifetap
though???). Well I guess I'll just have to wait and see if the weapon really
does exist.. And who knows maybe the SK's have some kick ass sword available
by a quest (About the same odds as me winning the lottery without buying a
ticket).

Enjoy..

Thom
